actions.name: CompareFaces
actions.description: Grants permission to compare faces in the source input image with each face detected in the target input image

actions.name: CreateCollection
actions.description: Grants permission to create a collection in an AWS Region

actions.name: CreateDataset
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels dataset

actions.name: CreateProject
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels project

actions.name: CreateProjectVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to begin training a new version of a model

actions.name: CreateStreamProcessor
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Rekognition stream processor

actions.name: DeleteCollection
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified collection

actions.name: DeleteDataset
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels dataset

actions.name: DeleteFaces
actions.description: Grants permission to delete faces from a collection

actions.name: DeleteProject
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a project

actions.name: DeleteProjectVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a model

actions.name: DeleteStreamProcessor
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the specified stream processor

actions.name: DescribeCollection
actions.description: Grants permission to read details about a collection

actions.name: DescribeDataset
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels dataset

actions.name: DescribeProjectVersions
actions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a model in an Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels project

actions.name: DescribeProjects
actions.description: Grants permission to list Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels projects

actions.name: DescribeStreamProcessor
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about the specified stream processor

actions.name: DetectCustomLabels
actions.description: Grants permission to detect custom labels in a supplied image

actions.name: DetectFaces
actions.description: Grants permission to detect human faces within an image provided as input

actions.name: DetectLabels
actions.description: Grants permission to detect instances of real-world labels within an image provided as input

actions.name: DetectModerationLabels
actions.description: Grants permission to detect moderation labels within the input image

actions.name: DetectProtectiveEquipment
actions.description: Grants permission to detect Personal Protective Equipment in the input image

actions.name: DetectText
actions.description: Grants permission to detect text in the input image and convert it into machine-readable text

actions.name: DistributeDatasetEntries
actions.description: Grants permission to distribute the entries in a training dataset across the training dataset and the test dataset for a project

actions.name: GetCelebrityInfo
actions.description: Grants permission to read the name, and additional information, of a celebrity

actions.name: GetCelebrityRecognition
actions.description: Grants permission to read the celebrity recognition results found in a stored video by an asynchronous celebrity recognition job

actions.name: GetContentModeration
actions.description: Grants permission to read the content moderation analysis results found in a stored video by an asynchronous content moderation job

actions.name: GetFaceDetection
actions.description: Grants permission to read the faces detection results found in a stored video by an asynchronous face detection job

actions.name: GetFaceSearch
actions.description: Grants permission to read the matching collection faces found in a stored video by an asynchronous face search job

actions.name: GetLabelDetection
actions.description: Grants permission to read the label detected resuls found in a stored video by an asynchronous label detection job

actions.name: GetPersonTracking
actions.description: Grants permission to read the list of persons detected in a stored video by an asynchronous person tracking job

actions.name: GetSegmentDetection
actions.description: Grants permission to get the vdeo segments found in a stored video by an asynchronous segment detection job

actions.name: GetTextDetection
actions.description: Grants permission to get the text found in a stored video by an asynchronous text detection job

actions.name: IndexFaces
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing collection with faces detected in the input image

actions.name: ListCollections
actions.description: Grants permission to read the collection Id's in your account

actions.name: ListDatasetEntries
actions.description: Grants permission to list the dataset entries in an existing Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels dataset

actions.name: ListDatasetLabels
actions.description: Grants permission to list the labels in a dataset

actions.name: ListFaces
actions.description: Grants permission to read metadata for faces in the specificed collection

actions.name: ListStreamProcessors
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of your stream processors

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of tags associated with a resource

actions.name: RecognizeCelebrities
actions.description: Grants permission to detect celebrities in the input image

actions.name: SearchFaces
actions.description: Grants permission to search the specificed collection for the supplied face ID

actions.name: SearchFacesByImage
actions.description: Grants permission to search the specificed collection for the largest face in the input image

actions.name: StartCelebrityRecognition
actions.description: Grants permission to start the asynchronous recognition of celebrities in a stored video

actions.name: StartContentModeration
actions.description: Grants permission to start asynchronous detection of explicit or suggestive adult content in a stored video

actions.name: StartFaceDetection
actions.description: Grants permission to start asynchronous detection of faces in a stored video

actions.name: StartFaceSearch
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous search for faces in a collection that match the faces of persons detected in a stored video

actions.name: StartLabelDetection
actions.description: Grants permission to start asynchronous detection of labels in a stored video

actions.name: StartPersonTracking
actions.description: Grants permission to start the asynchronous tracking of persons in a stored video

actions.name: StartProjectVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to start running a model version

actions.name: StartSegmentDetection
actions.description: Grants permission to start the asynchronous detection of segments in a stored video

actions.name: StartStreamProcessor
actions.description: Grants permission to start running a stream processor

actions.name: StartTextDetection
actions.description: Grants permission to start the asynchronous detection of text in a stored video

actions.name: StopProjectVersion
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a running model version

actions.name: StopStreamProcessor
actions.description: Grants permission to stop  a running stream processor

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to a resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from a resource

actions.name: UpdateDatasetEntries
actions.description: Grants permission to add or update one or more JSON Lines (entries) in a dataset
